title: Hybrid - Gyrations - 1980s Garage-Psyche Compilations [MP3-320kb
description:
Hybrid - Gyrations - 1980s Garage-Psyche Compilations
=====================================================

Sampled from the original vinyl at 44KHz 16-bit Stereo
Scratch removal by Brian Davies ClickRepair v2.2.1
Noise removal by Brian Davies&#039; latest creations DeNoise v1.1 and DeNoiseLF v1.0
Normalization and Equalization by Audacity v1.3.4
ID3 Tags by TagScanner v5.0
MP3 Encoding at 320Kb/s CBR with LAME v3.97


To my knowledge Hybrid Records only released 8 albums and a couple of mini-albums/EPs
in the mid-1980s. All their releases are now extremely rare. These two compilations
were samplers for those releases. 



Gyrations Across The Nations
============================

Side 1:

The Lime Spiders - Slave Girl
The Beasts Of Bourbon - Evil Ruby
The Vandals - Mohawk Town
The Spikes - Flashback To Acid Beach
Guadalcanal Diary - Watusi Rodeo


Side 2:

The Vandals - Ladykiller
The Lime Spiders - Beyond The Fringe
The Spikes - Ain&#039;t No Friend Of Mine
The Beasts Of Bourbon - Drop Out
Guadalcanal Diary - Trail Of Tears


(P) 1985 Hybrid Records HYBRID1



Gyrations Volume II
===================

Side 1:

The Wayward Souls - Unknown Journey
Jon Wayne - Mr. Egyptian
Multicoloured Shades - (The Ballad Of) The Voodoo Ranger
The Volcanoes - Into The Psyche
Honolulu Mountain Daffodils - Electrified Sons Of Randy Alvey


Side 2:

The Volcanoes - Wild
Multicoloured Shades - Heartbeat
Honolulu Mountain Daffodils - The Sinners Club
The Wayward Souls - Now
Jon Wayne - Texas Polka


(P) 1985 Hybrid Records HYBRID2
